page.title: 07Recreation in Brafferton
page.content:
One of the most interesting events in the village occurs during the annual Summer Fete and this is the {Tug-of-War Contest}between teams drawn from the neighbouring villages of Coatham Mundeville and Brafferton.
Half the proceeds of the fete are to be donated to the{Fund}set up by the Darlington Memorial Hospital to purchase a{Cervical Cancer Scanner.
Other events organised by the Village Hall Association every year are the{Childrens Party}at Christmas time and the{Pensioners Dinner.
